body_html: For this build (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/8592/consoleFull), do you think there is a way to make it stop at 16:32:41 error: command 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\2017\\Community\\VC\\Tools\\MSVC\\14.11.25503\\bin\\HostX86\\x64\\link.exe' failed with exit status 1120 instead of the build stopped: subcommand failed line later? It would help giving much clearer signal for debugging.

body: For this build (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/8592/consoleFull), do you think there is a way to make it stop at `16:32:41 error: command 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Visual Studio\\2017\\Community\\VC\\Tools\\MSVC\\14.11.25503\\bin\\HostX86\\x64\\link.exe' failed with exit status 1120` instead of the `build stopped: subcommand failed` line later?
